mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM as ROWNO, a.PROJECT_INCREAMENT_ID , a.PROJECT_NAME , b.XM , b.XH, c.STUDENT_PHONE, d.XM TEACHER_NAME, a.PROJECT_COST , a.PROJECT_RANK , a.PROJECT_STATUS from "DLMU_DXSCX"."PROJECT" a LEFT JOIN "DATACT"."VI_XG_DXS_XSXJ" b on (a.PROJECT_HEAD_ID = b.XH) LEFT JOIN "DLMU_DXSCX"."STUDENT" C on(b.XH = c.STUDENT_ID) LEFT JOIN "DATACT"."VI_XG_DXS_JZG" d ON(d.GH = a.PROJECT_TUTOR_ID) where b.XYM = #{collegeName} ) t where ROWNO > #{startRow} and ROWNO <= #{endRow}

select count(*) from (select a.PROJECT_INCREAMENT_ID , a.PROJECT_NAME , b.XM , b.XH, c.STUDENT_PHONE, d.XM TEACHER_NAME, a.PROJECT_COST , a.PROJECT_RANK , a.PROJECT_STATUS from "DLMU_DXSCX"."PROJECT" a LEFT JOIN "DATACT"."VI_XG_DXS_XSXJ" b on (a.PROJECT_HEAD_ID = b.XH) LEFT JOIN "DLMU_DXSCX"."STUDENT" C on(b.XH = c.STUDENT_ID) LEFT JOIN "DATACT"."VI_XG_DXS_JZG" d ON(d.GH = a.PROJECT_TUTOR_ID) where b.XYM = #{collegeName} ) t
